item.name: Va'ardalia's Legacy
entries: This sword, originally owned by Aribeth (Va'ardalia) de Tylmarande, has known both justice and corruption. Returned to the Tylmarande family after Aribeth's death, it serves as a reminder of Aribeth's fall to darkness and the shame she brought to her family name. While retaining the visual appearance of nothing more than a well-crafted longsword, there are deeper layers of history and power to the weapon.

entries.name: Legacy
entries: This weapon can only be attuned to by someone of the Tylmarande bloodline. Any attempt made by someone outside of the bloodline results in swift and painful incapacitation at best, instant death at worst.
Due to its high level of craftsmanship, the weapon grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls.

entries.name: Vengeance
entries: When you use this unsheathed weapon to attack a target that has caused damage to you in this combat encounter, your bonus to attack and damage rolls against that target increases to +3.
When the weapon is used sheathed, this bonus is +2 instead of +3.

entries.name: Dark Motive
entries: There is no avoiding the dark past of a blade wielded in anger- though how this may manifest is as yet undiscovered. (TT)

entries.name: Descent
entries: As they fall, so may they yet rise again. If the bearer is attuned to both Va'ardalia's Legacy and its counterpart, you gain the ability to regenerate hit points equal to your level whenever you successfully deal damage to a living creature.

item.name: Tolivast's Trickery
entries: Known to most as 'the False Crown of Neverwinter', this formerly cursed artifact was used by Seldra Tylmarande in her attempt to claim the throne of Neverwinter. This version of the crown was believed to have been destroyed. Three of its four false sapphires bear cracks - the fourth remains flawless.

entries.name: Legacy
entries: This item can only be attuned to by someone of the Tylmarande bloodline. Any attempt made by someone outside of the bloodline results in instant death to fire and ice.

entries.name: Former Madness
entries: The first time the bearer of this item is attuned to it and enters within 60 feet of Va'ardalia's Legacy, roll a d20. On a score or 12 or lower, they begin to succumb to the remnants of Tolivast's spell. If the die roll was an even number, they begin to experience mild hallucinations. If the die roll was an odd number, they become incapable of speech for one minute. On a roll of 1, they become frightened of the nearest person to them- this lasts until they are no longer in contact with the crown, or until they move beyond 60 feet of Va'ardalia's Legacy.

item.name: Aribeth's Atonement
entries: Once a simple ring worn by Aribeth de Tylmarande, this silver band has been transfigured to roughly resemble the Crown of Neverwinter. Each of the four main sapphire chips pulses with arcane power.

entries.name: Legacy
entries: This item can only be attuned to by someone of the Tylmarande bloodline. Any attempt made by someone outside of the bloodline results in paralysis that lasts for a full day after the ring has been removed.

entries.name: Family Honor
entries: The first time the bearer of this item is attuned to it and enters within 120 feet of Va'ardalia's Legacy, roll a d20. On a score of 10 or higher, they can pinpoint the location of Va'ardalia's Legacy to within a 10 foot radius. On a score of less than 10, they begin to hear phantom whispers of prayer to Tyr.

entries.name: Arise
entries: If the bearer is attuned to both Aribeth's Atonement and Va'ardalia's Legacy, you gain resistance to spells of all types.

item.name: Waterdhavian Winter Gloves
entries: A pair of delicate yet well-made gloves. Worn by Waterdhavian locals in the colder months, this pair is sized for an older child or petite woman, and is surprisingly resistant to cold and damp.

entries.name: Clever Craftwork
entries: While keeping your hands surprisingly warm, anyone holding snow or ice in their hands while wearing these gloves might notice that it melts a lot slower than it should - making for better snowballs! You gain +1 to any ranged snowball attack made while wearing these gloves - but only if outdoors.

item.name: Toy Slingshot
entries: A sturdy slingshot of treated wood, rubber-like strips and a dark leather pocket.

entries.name: Mischief Managed
entries: This was gifted to Aricia by Mikael after watching her throw Goodberries at Gailardia. Now she can 'throw' them even further...

item.name: Dual-Bladed Glaive
entries: A less common style of glaive, this weapon has a blade on each of its ends. Wielders have specialised beyond normal two-weapon fighting training to be able to deal more damage in a single flowing move than most other polearm weapons.

entries.name: Two-Handed
entries: This weapon requires two hands to use. This property is relevant only when you attack with the weapon, not when you simply hold it.

entries.name: Reach
entries: This weapon adds 5 feet to your reach when you attack with it. This property also determines your reach for opportunity attacks with a reach weapon.

entries.name: Heavy
entries: Small creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls with heavy weapons. A heavy weapon's size and bulk make it too large for a Small creature to use effectively.
